biography: Phil Cook is an American guitarist, banjoist, pianist and singer. He is a vocalist and multi-instrumentalist in the freak-folk band Megafaun. Before he became a member of Megafaun, Cook was part of DeYarmond Edison. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
name: Phil Cook

discogs.name: Phil Cook
discogs.profile: American folk/bluegrass musician and songwriter. Originally from Chippewa Falls, Wisconsin, Cook was a member of many early [a818925] projects including [a1432377] and [a2228785]. Based in Durham, NC since 2005, Cook cofounded the band [a1678449] and has been active in the North Carolina music scene as a solo artist, session musician, and regular member of [a2153688].
